title: Enhancing Instructional Design Practical Competencies: The IDEA Model for Improving Scientific Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can systematically search and evaluate scientific research materials to select credible sources with ≥80% accuracy.
Learners can effectively organize and analyze data generated from science experiments to produce reports.
Learners can accurately cite scientific references in APA style according to academic writing standards.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
